basics.name: Kimi Li
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

highlights: Efficiently manage a fast-paced work environment to accommodate guests within the restaurant’s time limit.
Accurately take and serve customer orders, ensuring timely delivery of broth, ingredients, beverages.
Provided attentive and personalized service to guests, ensuring a high-quality dining experience.
Having in-depth knowledge of the restaurant’s menu, including the Japanese ingredients and preparations.

work.company: Board of Student Publications Staff at Kapiolani Community College
highlights: Collaborated with another designer to create layouts for two magazines.
Incorporated feedbacks from advisor to refine designs and layout.

awards.title: Bronze Award for Sales Promotion for Sango
